amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to enforce additional requirements on the state of Texas as they relate to spending levels for elementary and secondary education.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 154 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds in H.R. 1 to carry out paragraph 11 of section 101 of Public Law 111-226.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A161) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 187 (Roll no. 145).
